item.title: CV
item.description: Website info: This website was built using Hugo and following Stephanie Stantcheva’s code. Many thanks to her! The PhD life at CORE, UCLouvain Here is an article written by Paolo Giovanni Piacquadio describing the PhD life at CORE. It was written more than 10 years ago, but it is still very close to today’s business! A short history of CORE, UCLouvain Coming soon Who was E.G. de Barsy? Coming soon
